fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: We monitor the EU Plastics Strategy in order understand potential upcoming regulations related to teh production and use of plastics.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Flustix is a sustainability certification body for plastic-free and partially plastic-free products. Our goal is to reduce the use of consumer plastics which account for 80 percent of plastic waste found in nature. After Flustix chemically analyses products and then labels approved items with the Flustix certificate. By making plastic-reduction clearly visible for customers, we provide guidance and the opportunity to make a plastic-aware buying decision. Flustix supports plastic alternatives and communicates sustainability for innovative brands.
